feed.title: Speedtest Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v0.26.0
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Implement a blocked servers list by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1896

What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fixed dockerfile build steps for better caching by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1902
  • Bump league/commonmark from 2.5.3 to 2.6.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1903
  • [Chore] Update policies to use Illuminate\Auth\Access\Response by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1908
  • Laravel 11.35.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1906
  • Release v0.26.0 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1909

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v0.25.1...v0.26.0

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: ðŸš€ v1.0.0
entry.content:
ðŸš€ Speedtest Tracker Release v1.0.0

I'm thrilled to announce the release of Speedtest Tracker v1.0.0! This milestone has been a long time coming (824 days, not that I'm counting), and I'm wicked excited to finally say "I think this is a good first version".

I also want to take a moment to say a special thanks to those who contributed:

  • svenvg93
  • adamus1red
  • UnAfraid
  • jonezy35
  • wdog
  • nandi95
  • garanda21
  • jocmp

To see more contributors, visit the contributors page.

Current Features

  • Automated Tests: Schedule regular speed tests to monitor your internet connection's performance over time.
  • Detailed Metrics: Capture download and upload speeds, ping, packet loss and more.
  • Historical Data: View historical data and trends to identify patterns and issues with your internet connection.
  • Notifications: Receive notifications when your internet performance drops below a certain threshold.

Planned Features

I doubt this project will ever be "done" so here's a sneak peak for what I have planned for after the New Year.

  • Multiple Speedtest Schedules: Support for multiple speedtest schedules and make them configurable in the UI.
  • Ping Tests: Addition of ping tests to measure network latency.
  • Additional Speedtest Tools: Integration with additional testing tools like iPerf, LibreSpeed and OpenSpeedTest.
  • API: Introduction of an API for better integration with other applications and services.
  • Revamped Dashboard: An improved and more user-friendly dashboard for better data visualization and user experience.

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.0.1
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Add possibility to pass initial admin credentials with env variables by @twinpixxx in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1924

What's Changed

  • Move User panel to Settings by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1926
  • [Bug] Fix logic to check for existing server ID in SelectSpeedtestServerJob by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1929
  • Release v1.0.1 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1930

New Contributors

  • @twinpixxx made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1924

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [Bug] Fix filtering on healthy in results table by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1936
  • [Improvement] Add placeholder for failed test without message field by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1940

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for Speedtest Tracker: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's New

  • [Feature] Specify network interface to use by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1963
  • [Feature] Implement middleware to prevent overlapping execution of "RunSpeedtestJob" by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1952
  • [feature] Add environment values for Thresholds during initial setup by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1933

What's Changed

  • [Feature] Added custom "blank" and "filled" Blade directives by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1951
  • [Chore] Add logging configuration file and set stderr as the default by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1958
  • add: Turkish (tr_TR) localization added. by @ramazansancar in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1955
  • [Bug] Fix placeholder erorr messages by @svenvg93 in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1965
  • Laravel 11.37.0 Shift by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1964
  • Release v1.0.3 by @alexjustesen in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1971

New Contributors

  • @ramazansancar made their first contribution in https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/pull/1955

Full Changelog: https://github.com/alexjustesen/speedtest-tracker/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3
